trans-unit.target: TEXT_MANFST000_00083_SEQ_00<tab>Gridania Opening
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_SEQ_01<tab>Gridania Opening
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_TODO_00<tab>Speak with...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100040_NARRATION<tab>Hydaelyn─a vibrant planet blessed by the light of the Crystal.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100050_NARRATION<tab>Amid azure seas, encompassing the westernmost of the Three Great Continents,
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100060_NARRATION<tab>there lies a realm embraced by gods and forged by heroes. Her name...Eorzea.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100070_NARRATION<tab>Eorzean history charts the rise of a succession of great civilizations, each enjoying an age of peace─the Astral Eras.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100080_NARRATION<tab>To date, all have proven ephemeral.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100090_NARRATION<tab>In the year 1572 of the Sixth and most recent Astral Era,
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100100_NARRATION<tab>the northern empire of Garlemald amassed a great army at the heart of Eorzea, seeking dominion over all.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100110_NARRATION<tab>Rising in desperate resistance, the forces of the Eorzean Alliance met their would-be conquerors in the field.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100120_NARRATION<tab>Yet even as the battle raged, the lesser moon, Dalamud, was plucked from the heavens through imperial machination.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100130_NARRATION<tab>From its core emerged the elder primal Bahamut, who unleashed his fury upon the realm.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100140_NARRATION<tab>The devastation brought Eorzea to its knees, and the era to its end.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100150_NARRATION<tab>Yet every end marks a new beginning.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100160_NARRATION<tab>Five years have come and gone.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100170_NARRATION<tab>The light of life still shines upon Eorzea.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100180_NARRATION<tab>Man labors tirelessly to raise himself from the Calamity's ruin.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100190_NARRATION<tab>The realm is forever changed, a stranger to him once more.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100200_NARRATION<tab>Yet heedless of what lies ahead, he shall press on,
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100210_NARRATION<tab>spurred by the promise of peace and prosperity.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100220_NARRATION<tab>Amid this period of great change, an adventurer arrives in Eorzea...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100230_NARRATION<tab>one whose tale is yet unwritten.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_100240_NARRATION<tab>May he ever walk in the light of the Crystal.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_000010_MOTHERCRYSTAL<tab>Hear...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_000020_MOTHERCRYSTAL<tab>Hear... Feel...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_000030_MOTHERCRYSTAL<tab>Hear... Feel... Think...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_1<tab>(-???-)...Oi!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_2<tab>(-???-)Y'all right, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_3<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)You were moanin' in your sleep an' sweatin' buckets besides.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_4<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)That'll be the aether, I reckon. Some are more prone to the sickness than others.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_5<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)No need to fret, though. You'll soon get used to it.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_6<tab>(-Furry Creature-)Feeling better, kupo?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_7<tab>(-Furry Creature-)Aha! You <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> see us! I had a feeling you could, kupo!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_8<tab>(-Moogle-)We're moogles, and we live in this wood.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_9<tab>(-Moogle-)Normal folks can't see or hear us─which makes you <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_10<tab>(-Moogle-)And seeing as how you're special, maybe you can tell us something.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_11<tab>(-Moogle-)The wood's been restless of late─lots of strange things happening. Have you chanced to witness anything suspicious, kupo?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_12<tab>(-Moogle-)But of course you haven't─you've only just arrived.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_KUPLOKOPP_000_13<tab>(-Moogle-)Well, there's nothing for it, then─we'll just have to keep looking. Nice to meet you, kupo!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_14<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Gridania's still a fair way off, in case you were wonderin'. Seein' as you're awake, how's about you keep me company till we get there?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_15<tab>(-Grizzled Passenger-)Them young'uns don't much care for conversation, see.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_16<tab>Bremondt's the name, an' peddlin's me trade.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_17<tab>As for your good self, judgin' by your unusual garments, I'd say you were one of them new adventurers. Am I warm?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_18<tab>I knew it! Goin' wherever the wind blows, seekin' fortune an' glory─now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> what I call livin'!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_19<tab>So long as you can avoid dyin', I mean. Ain't no secret that adventurin's a risky business─these days especially.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_20<tab>What was it that first attracted you to it?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_Q1_000_1<tab>Why did you become an adventurer?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_A1_000_1<tab>To gain power.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_A1_000_2<tab>To win glory.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_A1_000_3<tab>To amass a fortune.

TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_21<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>Power<var 1A 01 /var>? As in, er...power to do good? Like protectin' the weak, an' fightin' for what's right, an' all that? Aye, I thought that's what you meant. Well, adventurers do get up to a lot of fightin', that's for sure. You'll never be short of a chance to polish your warcraft in the adventurin' business.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_22<tab>When you arrive in town, you'd best enroll at the Adventurers' Guild─they'll set you on the right path.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_23<tab>An' it wouldn't hurt to join a guild, neither.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_24<tab>Gridania's home to a few, so if you fancy learnin' how to fight with a bow, a polearm, or even spells, you should think about seekin' one out.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_25<tab>Glory, eh? Well, if you're willin' to take on them tasks as other folk ain't, an adventurer such as yourself can win fame what coin can't buy.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_26<tab>When you arrive in town, you'll want to report to the Adventurers' Guild.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_27<tab>You can find out everythin' you need to know about the adventurin' business in there.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_28<tab>Fortune, eh? Well, it's a dream we've all had at one time or another.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_29<tab>Once you've learned to handle yourself in a fight, you'll want to pay a visit to whichever craftin' or gatherin' guild tickles your fancy.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_30<tab>Gridania's renowned for its leatherworkers an' carpenters, not to mention its botanists.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_31<tab>Adventurin' ain't just about killin' things, after all. A peaceful pastime may well help you make your fortune!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_32<tab>Well, if you ain't inclined to tell, I ain't about to pry. Might be as ol' Bremondt's a chatterbox, but he sure as hells ain't no busybody.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_33<tab>We all have a secret or three, don't we? Me? <var 1A 02 /var>Dozens<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_34<tab>An' I'd rather they stayed secret, too─which is why I don't go stickin' me nose where it ain't welcome.

TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_35<tab>Just remember, though: there're more important things than fortune an' glory. Such as <var 1A 02 /var>breathin'<var 1A 01 /var>. Ain't no profit in bein' dead, an' that's a fact.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_WOODWAILER_000_36<tab>Halt! Go no further!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_37<tab>What's this, then?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_38<tab>Uwaaah!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_COACHMAN_000_39<tab>Wh-What's going on!?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_WOODWAILER_000_40<tab>A skirmish has broken out up ahead with the Ixal! For your own safety, you must remain here until─
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_WOODWAILER_000_41<tab>Bloody hells! We shall hold them here! Try to break clear!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_42<tab>That was too bleedin' close...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_43<tab>Nice of the Ixal to send us a welcomin' party, though, eh?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_44<tab>Jokin' aside, this won't be the last time you meet those feathered fiends, so just you take care, all right?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_45<tab>By the by, is this your first trip to Gridania?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_Q2_000_1<tab>Is this your first trip to Gridania?
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_A2_000_1<tab>Yes.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_A2_000_2<tab>No.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_46<tab>It is!? Well then, let this journeyed itinerant tell you the ins an' outs of your destination.

TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_47<tab>Thought not! Ah, but I'll wager there've been some changes since your last visit. Allow a journeyed itinerant to teach you a few new things about your destination. Ahem!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_48<tab>The city of Gridania lies slap-bang in the middle of the Black Shroud─the biggest, lushest forest in all Eorzea.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_49<tab>Though it ain't near as lush as it used to be, sayin' that. Not since the Calamity laid half of it to waste.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_50<tab>The destruction prompted a herd of new nasties to move in, an' gave the Ixal unneeded encouragement. Birdman raids've become a daily occurrence.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_51<tab>Ah, at long last.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_52<tab>Behold Gridania, the forest nation blessed by the elementals!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300250_NARRATION<tab>The Black Shroud─the ancient forest close to the heart of Eorzea.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300260_NARRATION<tab>Beneath the boughs of its towering trees lies the woodland city<var 1F /var>state of Gridania.

TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300270_NARRATION<tab>Once a sanctuary from the world beyond the Hedge, even the mighty elementals, eternal guardians of the forest, could not forestall the coming of the Seventh Umbral Era.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300280_NARRATION<tab>However, the goddess Nophica was never one to forsake Her children, and today She welcomes another brave soul...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300290_NARRATION<tab>one who may yet play a telling role in the tale of this great realm.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_60<tab>An' here's where we part ways, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_61<tab>I'm off to the markets to deliver me wares, then it's back to the highroad for me.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_62<tab>Here, I want you to have this─by way of thanks for keepin' me company.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_63<tab>Hey─you never did tell me your name, did you? Well, here's an idea...
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BREMONDT_000_64<tab>Become the sort of storied personage I can brag about havin' met, an' I'll consider us square.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300300_NARRATION<tab>May the Matron take <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to Her Bosom, that <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> may never want.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_300310_NARRATION<tab>And in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> heart sow serenity, purity, and sanctity.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BERTENNANT_000_70<tab>(-???-)You there! Yes, you!
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BERTENNANT_000_71<tab>(-Wood Wailer-)Your face is not known to me. Newly come to the city, no doubt.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BERTENNANT_000_72<tab>I am Bertennant, a Wood Wailer of Gridania.
TEXT_MANFST000_00083_BERTENNANT_000_73<tab>It is my duty to protect our nation from her enemies while welcoming those who may yet prove her friends. Let us see which you are.
